name: Sleek
headline: 1-click checkout from every store on the internet + cashback rewards.
description:
Sleek provides B2C businesses with a custom browser extension that works on both mobile and desktop. With the extension, you can:
- Auto-complete checkout for users with an Apple-pay-like experience tied specifically to your brand.
- Offer Honey-like couponing to help your users save money.
- Grant users extra cashback at 1000's of online stores, funded by Sleek.

Your users spend time and money in the browser. With Sleek, you can be there for them.

founders.name: Adam MacEachern, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CEO @ Sleek
Previously: Management Consultant @ Kearney

founders.name: Daniel Baum, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & COO @ Sleek
Previously: Corporate Lawyer @ Bennett Jones LLP

founders.name: Palmer McCutcheon, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder & CTO @ Sleek
Previously: Software Engineer @ Microsoft

## Automatic coupons, product intelligence, and rewards. Powered by AI.
[Contact Us](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)

![Qoala](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/669963f0634bf35a1a835f1d_Qoala%20logo.png)
![Bridge Money](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/669963f01cc10ca2a38f6160_Bridge%20Money%20logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/67904179b116f3c3808d662f_VoucherCodes%20logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/673d072436937aa770105de6_Price.com%20logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/673d0724a3e6e1b2ebc0dc08_Basket%20logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/673d072456182d39e8cfe521_Vetted%20logo.png)
Sleek’s AI agents understand the internet and interact with webpages. Just like a human would.
## How it works
### Automatically find and apply the best coupons with AI
Save your users money. Sleek’s AI can auto apply coupons at millions of sites, in any language, with no manual maintenance. Use Sleek’s codes or bring your own.
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6792c9a08b7e1e800582bca3_LP%20couponing%20view.png)
[1Add Sleek (It's Free!)Install the browser extension & create your profile.](https://www.onsleek.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[2Shop Like UsualShop online and find great deals with Sleek.](https://www.onsleek.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[3Checkout In 1-ClickWhen you're ready to buy, checkout is only 1-click.](https://www.onsleek.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[4Get Cash BackGet extra cash back when you shop online.](https://www.onsleek.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6110d606d55d14759b735b89_ezgif.com-gif-maker%20\(1\).gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6110d9f470af241b5f6cd8f0_ezgif.com-gif-maker%20\(7\).gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6110d65e4933f9fa1df59bdf_ezgif.com-gif-maker%20\(3\).gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6110d881e78f60d59c64379c_ezgif.com-gif-maker%20\(6\).gif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/64c19a77dddc0a065f31e484_cashback%20view.png)
### Cashback rewards, 1000's of stores
Show users cashback deals directly in the browser. Use Sleek's deals, or plug in your own.The extension can even show cashback offers natively in Google search results.
Request a Demo
### Classify eCommerce webpages
Identify and classify eCommerce pages as product, cart, checkout, order confirmation, and more. Be there for your users every step of the way.
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6792df2a08ac36bd299ad43d_Page%20classification%20LP.png)
### Get product-level detail to power personalized experiences
Help your users find the products they want. Power price history, tracking, comparisons, and more. Plus, highlight those pesky product-specific exclusions.‍
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6792ca9b54515340083cc62a_Sleek%20PDP.png)
### Automated code validation
Input any set of codes and find out which ones are valid. Sleek’s AI agent tests your codes on real merchant sites, so you can be confident in having accurate, up-to-date, and valid codes.
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6792e541bc09ffcf561cd462_LP%20code%20validation.png)
### Offer your users cash back rewards at 1000's of stores
Sleek can power cash back everywhere - in browser extensions, websites, and apps, with full support for desktop and mobile. Use Sleek’s deals or connect your own.
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6792cbdea795060b2d24a9cd_Cashback%20LP.png)
### Privacy and security
All data is secured with bank-level encryption. Sleek does not require end-user PII and will not ingest or store it.‍
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/641c5feb85e6b7aa9ff48599_security%20laptop.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/641c5feb85e6b7aa9ff48599_security%20laptop.png)
### Protect your data with enterprise-grade encryption
All data is secured with bank-level encryption. Sleek does not require end-user PII and will not ingest or store it. SOC 2 certification in progress.
Request a Demo
Backed By
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/640895f04ac2be0f4d3b006d_investors.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/64dbc4437a3bd16fe72cdf9e_investors_mobile%20LP.png)
### Sleek
### Building the world's smartest extensions.
Want in?
[Request a Demo](https://www.onsleek.com/</request-demo-form>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/6100ec1880a4250305ef428e_Sleek%20logo%20final_transparent_whiteout.png)](https://www.onsleek.com/</>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/60b92aadfc02f03fea5d2f1f_linkedin.svg)](https://www.onsleek.com/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/onsleek>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60b92aadfc02f0760e5d2e77/60b92aadfc02f070785d2eca_twitter.svg)](https://www.onsleek.com/<https:/twitter.com/trysleek>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sleek**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, Sleek is a Toronto-based startup on a mission to revolutionize the online shopping experience. The company aims to make checkout as seamless as a single click while offering users cashback rewards across thousands of stores. 

**What Does Sleek Do?**

Sleek initially launched as a custom browser extension for B2C businesses, available on both mobile and desktop. Here’s what it brings to the table:

- **1-Click Checkout**: Imagine checking out like you do with Apple Pay—fast and branded specifically for each merchant.
  
- **Automatic Coupons**: Similar to Honey, this feature applies the best coupons without you having to lift a finger, saving users real money.

- **Cashback Rewards**: Users can earn cashback at thousands of online stores, with Sleek footing the bill for these rewards.

The philosophy is straightforward: Users spend a lot of time and money browsing the internet, and with Sleek, brands can be right there with them, facilitating a better shopping experience.

**Key Features:**

1. **Automatic Coupons**: Save users money by auto-applying the best coupons available.
   
2. **Page Classification**: Sleek intelligently identifies eCommerce page types—whether it’s a product page, cart, checkout, or confirmation—enhancing user interaction.

3. **Product Intelligence**: Provide detailed product information, including price history and comparisons, to help users make informed decisions.

4. **Automated Code Validation**: Ensure that coupon codes are valid by testing them across real merchant websites.

5. **Cashback Options**: Highlight cashback offers both during the shopping process and in search results, making rewards easier to access.

**Security and Privacy**

Sleek takes user data security seriously, employing bank-level encryption and avoiding the capture of personally identifiable information (PII). They are also in the process of obtaining SOC 2 certification, which speaks volumes about their commitment to user privacy.

**Team and Investors**

With a small but mighty team of five, Sleek is backed by industry veterans, including Jared Friedman as their Group Partner. The startup has aligned itself in the broad intersections of fintech, machine learning, and e-commerce—fields ripe for innovation.

**Why Sleek?**

As online shopping continues to dominate, Sleek is positioned to be at the forefront of enhancing the user experience, alleviating the pain points of traditional checkout processes while rewarding users for their loyalty. It's a win-win.

If you’re interested in a hands-on demo or just want to explore more, head over to [Sleek’s website](https://www.onsleek.com/).
